item.title: Markdown使用技巧
item.description: 001.how to collapse a piece of code <details> <summary>The title you wanna fill in</summary> the content you wanna put it in <details> 002. how to show svg (legally and fix method) normal way![_EnumerateAudioEndpoints](/2024/July/17/flowchart_of_EnumerateEndpoint.svg) abnormal way<iframe src="/2024/July/17/flow_no_zoom.svg" width="900" height="2000" style="border:none; overflow:scroll; background: #333333;"> </iframe> now this method is not very good because when we scroll or zoom in and out the page, the svg shows not sync with the mother page.
